## Workflow

Load colrectr

```{r}
library(colrectr)
```

Read Excel file specifying path and sheet.
```{r}
colrect(path = "../inst/extdata/demo.xlsx",
        sheet = "降水量")
```

```{r}
colrect(path = "../inst/extdata/demo.xlsx",
        sheet = "降水量",
        col = 1,
        regex = "^年.月$",
        offset = c(0, 0),
        ends = list(row = "^2019$", col = "^12月$"))
```
